languages.text: Единице, носившей имя Авель Ханейманн, было даровано помилование за участие в схизме. Остаток дней Авель провел на станции Алтарь-Темплум-Каликсис-Экс-17 в монашеском уединении. Не тревожимый чужими голосами, он отдался страсти статистического прорицания и творению бинарных гармоник. Литургии его авторства исполнялись в машинных соборах и считались прекрасными прославлениями Омниссии, хотя и слегка неортодоксальными в силу особой живости, не свойственной механистичным гимнам Деус Механикус.

The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann was granted a pardon for his participation in the schism. Abel spent the rest of his days in monastic solitude on station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Not bothered by unwanted voices, he gave himself fully to the passion of statistical augury and the creation of binharic harmonics. His liturgies were performed in machine cathedrals and were regarded as beautiful hymns to the Omnissiah, even if somewhat unorthodox due to a certain liveliness not characteristic of mechanist hymns to the Deus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: Единице, носившей имя Авель Ханейманн, было даровано помилование за участие в схизме. Остаток дней Авель провел на станции Алтарь-Темплум-Каликсис-Экс-17 в монашеском уединении. Не тревожимый чужими голосами, он отдался страсти статистического прорицания и творению бинарных гармоник. traits.locale_text: The unit bearing the name of Abel Haneumann was granted a pardon for his participation in the schism. Abel spent the rest of his days in the Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 station in monastic solitude. Not bothered by other people's voices, he gave himself fully to the passion of statistical augury and the creation of binary harmonics. His liturgies were performed in machine cathedrals and were regarded as beautiful hymns to the Omnissiah, even if somewhat unorthodox due to a certain liveliness, not characteristic of mechanist hymns for Deus Mechanicum.

languages.text: 名为亚伯·哈努曼的单位被赦免了他参与分裂的罪行，余生都在卡利西斯祭坛17号空间站孤独度过。他没有被那些排斥他的声音所困扰，而是全身心地投入到数据扫描和二进制和声的激情工作之中。他在机器教堂里举行的礼拜仪式，尽管有些不太正统，但所有人都认为这是献给欧姆尼塞亚的美妙礼赞。亚伯的礼拜仪式总是充满了活力，与通常的机械赞美诗大相径庭。
languages.original_text: The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann was granted a pardon for his participation in the schism. Abel spent the rest of his days in monastic solitude on station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Not bothered by unwanted voices, he gave himself fully to the passion of statistical augury and the creation of binharic harmonics. His liturgies were performed in machine cathedrals and were regarded as beautiful hymns to the Omnissiah, even if somewhat unorthodox due to a certain liveliness not characteristic of mechanist hymns to the Deus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: 名为亚伯·哈努曼的单位被赦免了他参与分裂的罪行，余生都在卡利西斯祭坛17号空间站孤独度过。他没有被那些排斥他的声音所困扰，而是全身心地投入到数据扫描和二进制和声的激情工作之中。他在机器教堂里举行的礼拜仪式，尽管有些不太正统，但所有人都认为这是献给欧姆尼塞亚的美妙礼赞。亚伯的礼拜仪式总是充满了活力，与通常的机械赞美诗大相径庭。

languages.text: Die Einheit mit dem Namen Abel Haneumann wurde für ihre Beteiligung an dem Schisma begnadigt. Abel verbrachte den Rest seiner Tage in klösterlicher Einsamkeit auf der Station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Dort störten ihn keine unerwünschten Stimmen und er konnte sich ganz seiner Leidenschaft der statistischen Weissagung sowie der Komposition binhärer Harmonien widmen. Seine Liturgien wurden in Maschinenkathedralen aufgeführt und galten als wunderschöne Hymnen an den Omnissiah, wenn auch etwas unorthodox. Ihnen wohnte nämlich eine gewisse Lebhaftigkeit inne, die nicht charakteristisch für mechanistische Hymnen des Deus Mechanicus ist.
languages.original_text: The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann was granted a pardon for his participation in the schism. Abel spent the rest of his days in monastic solitude on station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Not bothered by unwanted voices, he gave himself fully to the passion of statistical augury and the creation of binharic harmonics. His liturgies were performed in machine cathedrals and were regarded as beautiful hymns to the Omnissiah, even if somewhat unorthodox due to a certain liveliness not characteristic of mechanist hymns to the Deus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: Die Einheit mit dem Namen Abel Haneumann wurde für ihre Beteiligung an dem Schisma begnadigt. Abel verbrachte den Rest seiner Tage in klösterlicher Einsamkeit auf der Station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Dort störten ihn keine unerwünschten Stimmen und er konnte sich ganz seiner Leidenschaft der statistischen Weissagung sowie der Komposition binhärer Harmonien widmen. Seine Liturgien wurden in Maschinenkathedralen aufgeführt und galten als wunderschöne Hymnen an den Omnissiah, wenn auch etwas unorthodox. Ihnen wohnte nämlich eine gewisse Lebhaftigkeit inne, die nicht charakteristisch für mechanistische Hymnen des Deus Mechanicum ist.

languages.text: Abel Haneumann fut gracié pour le rôle qu'il avait joué lors du schisme. Il passa le restant de ses jours dans une solitude monastique sur la station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. N'était plus perturbé par des voix importunes, il put s'adonner pleinement à sa passion pour les présages statistiques et la création d'harmonies binhaires. Dans les Cathédrales de la Machine, ses liturgies étaient considérées comme de superbes hymnes à l'Omnimessie, quoiqu'un peu atypiques puisque pleines d'un entrain inhabituel pour les chants mécanistes dédiés au Deus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann was granted a pardon for his participation in the schism. Abel spent the rest of his days in monastic solitude on station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Not bothered by unwanted voices, he gave himself fully to the passion of statistical augury and the creation of binharic harmonics. His liturgies were performed in machine cathedrals and were regarded as beautiful hymns to the Omnissiah, even if somewhat unorthodox due to a certain liveliness not characteristic of mechanist hymns to the Deus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: Abel Haneumann fut gracié pour le rôle qu'il avait joué dans la dissension. Il passa le restant de ses jours dans une solitude monastique sur la station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Maintenant qu'il n’était plus perturbé par des voix importunes, il put s’adonner pleinement à sa passion pour les présages statistiques et la création d'harmonies binhaires. Dans les Cathédrales de la Machine, ses liturgies étaient considérées comme de superbes hymnes à l'Omnimessie, quoiqu'un peu atypiques puisque pleines d'un entrain inhabituel pour les chants mécanistes dédiés au Deus Mechanicum.

languages.text: La unidad de nombre Abel Haneumann recibió un perdón por su participación en el cisma. Abel pasó el resto de sus días en soledad monástica en la estación Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Sin las molestias de otras voces, se dedicó por entero a su pasión por los augurios estadísticos y la creación de armonías binarias. Sus liturgias se oficiaron en Catedrales Máquina y se consideraron hermosos himnos al Omnissiah, a pesar de la falta de ortodoxia de su tono animado, en contraste con los himnos monótonos tradicionales dedicados al Deus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann was granted a pardon for his participation in the schism. Abel spent the rest of his days in monastic solitude on station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Not bothered by unwanted voices, he gave himself fully to the passion of statistical augury and the creation of binharic harmonics. His liturgies were performed in machine cathedrals and were regarded as beautiful hymns to the Omnissiah, even if somewhat unorthodox due to a certain liveliness not characteristic of mechanist hymns to the Deus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: La unidad de nombre Abel Haneumann recibió un perdón por su participación en el cisma. Abel pasó el resto de sus días en soledad monástica en la estación Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Sin las molestias de otras voces, se dedicó por entero a su pasión por los augurios estadísticos y la creación de armonías binarias. Sus liturgias se oficiaron en Catedrales Máquina y se consideraron hermosos himnos al Omnissiah, a pesar de la falta de ortodoxia de su tono animado, en contraste con los himnos monótonos tradicionales dedicados al Deus Mechanicum.

languages.text: アベル・ヘニュマンの名を冠したユニットは、分離派に参加したことに対する恩赦を与えられた。アベルは残りの日々を修道院のステーション、アルター・テンプラム・カリクシス-Ext-17で孤独に過ごした。余計な声には煩わされず、統計的卜占とバイナリック・ハーモニクスの創作に没頭した。彼の典礼は機械の聖堂で演奏され、機械主義者のデウス・メカニクスへの賛歌にはない活気があるため、やや異端的ではあるものの、万機神への美しい賛歌とみなされた。
languages.original_text: The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann was granted a pardon for his participation in the schism. Abel spent the rest of his days in monastic solitude on station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Not bothered by unwanted voices, he gave himself fully to the passion of statistical augury and the creation of binharic harmonics. His liturgies were performed in machine cathedrals and were regarded as beautiful hymns to the Omnissiah, even if somewhat unorthodox due to a certain liveliness not characteristic of mechanist hymns to the Deus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: アベル・ヘニュマンの名を冠したユニットは、分離派に参加したことに対する恩赦を与えられた。アベルは残りの日々を修道院のステーション、アルター・テンプラム・カリクシス-Ext-17で孤独に過ごした。余計な声には煩わされず、統計的卜占とバイナリック・ハーモニクスの創作に没頭した。彼の典礼は機械の聖堂で演奏され、機械主義者のデウス・メカニクスへの賛歌にはない活気があるため、やや異端的ではあるものの、万機神への美しい賛歌とみなされた。

languages.text: Abel Haneumann ismini taşıyan birimin bölünmeye müdahil olma suçu affedildi. Abel, geriye kalan günlerini Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 istasyonunda inzivada geçirdi. Tüm tutkusunu, istenmeyen sesler tarafından rahatsız edilmeden istatistiksel alametlere ve ikilidil armonileri yaratmaya adadı. Yazdığı ayinler, her ne kadar Deus Mechanicus'a adanan mekanik ilahilerin karakteristiklerinin dışına çıkan ve belli bir canlılık barındıran, olağan dışı yapıtlar olsa da makine katedrallerinde okundular ve Hermesih adına yazılmış, harikulade ilahiler olarak saygı gördüler.
languages.original_text: The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann was granted a pardon for his participation in the schism. Abel spent the rest of his days in monastic solitude on station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Not bothered by unwanted voices, he gave himself fully to the passion of statistical augury and the creation of binharic harmonics. His liturgies were performed in machine cathedrals and were regarded as beautiful hymns to the Omnissiah, even if somewhat unorthodox due to a certain liveliness not characteristic of mechanist hymns to the Deus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: Abel Haneumann ismini taşıyan birimin, bölünmeye müdâhil olma suçu affedildi. Abel geriye kalan günlerini Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 istasyonunda inzivada geçirdi. Tüm tutkusunu, istenmeyen sesler tarafından rahatsız edilmeden, istatistiksel alametlere ve ikidil armonileri yaratmaya adadı. Yazdığı ayinler, her ne kadar Deus Mechanicus'a adanan mekanik ilahilerin sahip olduğu karakteristiklerin dışına çıkan ve belli bir canlılık barındıran, olağan dışı yapıtlar olsalar da, makine katedrallerinde okundular ve Hermesih adına yazılmış harikulade ilahiler olarak saygı gördüler.
